author: senh
title: Actor John Stamos charged with driving under the influence
text: BING NEWS: 'Full House' actor John Stamos charged with DUI after driving erratically in Beverly Hills “Full House” actor John Stamos has been charged with driving under the influence of drugs after he was spotted driving erratically in a Beverly Hills neighborhood, prosecutors said. Stamos, who stars in the new show “Grandfathered,” faces one ... 10/16/2015 - 6:21 am | View Link Actor John Stamos charged with DUI, faces jail sentence LOS ANGELES - John Stamos has been charged with DUI stemming from a June arrest in Beverly ... Stamos was arrested on June 12 in after it was reported that he was acting strangely and driving erratically. He was taken to a local hospital after authorities ... 10/16/2015 - 6:04 am | View Link Actor John Stamos to Be Charged with Driving Drugged Actor John Stamos is scheduled to be arraigned Friday on a misdemeanor charge of driving under the influence of a drug, authorities said today. Stamos, 52, was arrested June 12 in Beverly Hills after police stopped his vehicle near Canon Drive and Brighton ... 10/15/2015 - 11:27 pm | View Link Full House’ actor John Stamos charged with DUI in Beverly Hills incident LOS ANGELES — Actor John Stamos, known for his role in the sitcom “Full House,” was formally charged Thursday with driving under the influence in June in Beverly Hills, California.
